edge: In the context, Eddie 'The Fireblaster' Plant seemingly loses a Donkey Kong championship game to Sam Brenner. This event is included in a time capsule launched into space, which is later discovered and analyzed by the President of the United States, Will Cooper.
The extraterrestrial aliens in the form of Galaga besiege Andersen Air Force Base in Guam.
The aliens have mistaken the videocassette as a declaration of war and are attacking Earth with arcade game icons, according to Brenner's deduction.
The aliens challenge Earth to a best-of-five battle, claiming that Earth has lost the first match.
The aliens attack the Taj Mahal in the form of Arkanoid.
Brenner and Ludlow train Navy SEALs to play the games.
Violet develops effective energy weapons.
The aliens attack Hyde Park in the form of Centipede.
In New York City, Brenner and Ludlow fight against a giant Pac-Man in Mini Coopers as ghosts.
The aliens send a trophy in the form of the Duck Hunt dog.
Assists in New York City
Fights against a giant Pac-Man in Mini Coopers as ghosts
Tries to reason with it but gets his hand bitten off
Wins the game with Q*Bert as a trophy
Uses a cheat code written on his glasses during video game matches
Abducts Matty after discovering he used a cheat code written on glasses
Attack Washington, D.C. With an army of video game characters
Is attacked by Lady Lisa in the form of a video game character
Faces Donkey Kong as the trio is placed on the starting level with Donkey Kong and the captives at the top level during the final battle
Negotiates a peace agreement with the aliens after Earth is saved
Apologizes to Brenner for cheating and acknowledges him as the best Donkey Kong player
After Ludlow's devastation over Lisa's disappearance, Q*Bert transforms itself to resemble Lisa, giving Ludlow some solace and comfort in his grief.
In the context provided, Brenner and Violet start a romantic relationship with each other.
Eddie meets tennis player Serena Williams in the given context.
Eddie also meets Martha Stewart in the given context.
The aliens restore everything on Earth, including Iwatani's hand, as mentioned in the provided context.
In the given context, Ludlow is devastated over Lisa's disappearance.
After transforming itself into Lisa's likeness, Q*Bert gives Ludlow comfort in his grief over Lisa's disappearance.
In the final outcome of the given context, Ludlow and Lisa get married, and they have Q*Bert-like children together.
